source:
TEXT_LUCKZD004_03411_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Ose Sigun needs help growing mushrooms.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZD004_03411_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
プラ・エンニ茸窟のオセ＝シグンは、冒険者に頼みたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZD004_03411_TODO_00<tab>Slay an undine for its heart.
TEXT_LUCKZD004_03411_TODO_01<tab>Slay a phooka for its blood.
TEXT_LUCKZD004_03411_TODO_02<tab>Slay a psammead for its silk.
TEXT_LUCKZD004_03411_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the items to Ose Sigun.
target: TEXT_LUCKZD004_03411_TODO_03<tab>オセ＝シグンに依頼品を渡す

source: TEXT_LUCKZD004_03411_OSESIGUN_000_000<tab>Tell me, mortal─do you know what a “pla enni” is?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZD004_03411_OSESIGUN_000_000<tab>ウォッホン。
君、「プラ・エンニ」とは何か知っているかね？

source: TEXT_LUCKZD004_03411_OSESIGUN_000_001<tab>It's the name of not only our village, but a mushroom. A variety that is exceptionally difficult to grow.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZD004_03411_OSESIGUN_000_001<tab>この集落の名前にもなっている、「キノコ」のことだ。
プラ・エンニはとても繊細で、
育てるにはとても手間暇がかかるのだよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZD004_03411_OSESIGUN_000_002<tab>Some special items are needed in their cultivation, and I would be grateful if you could procure them for me.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZD004_03411_OSESIGUN_000_002<tab>そこでだ……！
私が君に必要な対価を支払う代わりに、
プラ・エンニの育成に必要な品を集めてはくれまいか？

source: TEXT_LUCKZD004_03411_OSESIGUN_000_003<tab>Specifically, what I require is an undine heart, a bottle of phooka blood, and a ball of psammead silk. Suffice it to say, you'll be suitably rewarded for your troubles.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZD004_03411_OSESIGUN_000_003<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EE101 /var>」と「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EE001 /var>」それから……
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EE201 /var>」が必要なのだ。
悪いが、よろしく頼むよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZD004_03411_OSESIGUN_000_004<tab>An undine heart, a bottle of phooka blood, and a ball of psammead silk─these are the items needed to cultivate pla enni mushrooms. Please procure them for me.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZD004_03411_OSESIGUN_000_004<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EE101 /var>」と「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EE001 /var>」それから……
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EE201 /var>」が必要なのだ。
悪いが、よろしく頼むよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZD004_03411_OSESIGUN_000_010<tab>There you are. Were you able to obtain the items I requested?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZD004_03411_OSESIGUN_000_010<tab>どうだね？
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EE101 /var>」と「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EE001 /var>」それから……
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EE201 /var>」を持ってきてくれたかね？

source: TEXT_LUCKZD004_03411_OSESIGUN_000_011<tab>Excellent! With these, we can ensure that the pla enni grow big and strong!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZD004_03411_OSESIGUN_000_011<tab>あああぁ、これこれ！
さすがだな！
これでプラ・エンニを育てられるよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZD004_03411_OSESIGUN_000_012<tab>How do we use the items, you ask? We give the mushrooms water purified with the undine heart, and fertilize them with nutrient-rich phooka blood. And as they grow, we reinforce them with psammead silk.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZD004_03411_OSESIGUN_000_012<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EE101 /var>で澄んだ水を与え、
<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EE001 /var>で栄養を与え、それから……
大きく育ったキノコが倒れないように、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EE201 /var>で補強するのだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZD004_03411_OSESIGUN_000_013<tab>Add some windows and doors, perhaps a flight of stairs, and it is ready to live in. My thanks, mortal. Here is your fitting reward.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZD004_03411_OSESIGUN_000_013<tab>こうすることで、私たちの家が出来上がるのさ！
ありがとう、旅人の君。
いい仕事に見合った、約束の対価を渡そう！
